src_original: [SaSū(C) 27] atha khalu sarvaśuro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavato 'ntikād utsāhaṃ śrutvā bhagavantam etad avocat:
tgt_original: 爾時一切勇菩薩白佛言。 世尊。

src_original: kiyantaṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ satvānāṃ āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati?
tgt_original: 若有眾生聞此法者壽命幾劫。

src_original: 2. bhagavān āha:
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: aśīti kalpās teṣāṃ satvānām āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati.
tgt_original: 壽命滿八十劫。

src_original: [SaSū(C) 28] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha:
tgt_original: 一切勇白佛言。

src_original: kiṃ bhagavan kalpasya pramāṇaṃ?
tgt_original: 劫以何量。

src_original: 2. bhagavān āha:
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: śṛṇu kulaputra,  tadyathāpināma sarvaśūra kaścid eva puruṣo nagaraṃ kārayed,  dvādaśayojanāyāmavistāraṃ,  ūrdhvena trīṇi yojanāni pramāṇaṃ;  3. tac ca nagaraṃ tilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ kuryāt;
tgt_original: 譬如大城縱廣十二由旬高三由旬盛滿胡麻。

src_original: 4. atha sa puruṣo varṣaśatasyātyayāt tatas tilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇān nagarād ekaṃ tilaphalakaṃ bahir nikṣiped;  anena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṇi tāni tilaphalakāni kṣayaṃ kuryāt,  tac ca nagaram amūlam apratiṣṭhānāṃ bhaven;  na cādyāpi ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta.  [SaSū(C) 29] 1. punar aparaṃ sarvaśūra:
tgt_original: 有長壽人過百歲已取一而去。

src_original: na ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta. etat sarvaśūra kalpasya pramāṇaṃ.  [SaSū(C) 30] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatva utthāyāsanād,  ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā,  dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
tgt_original: 劫猶不盡。

src_original: ye sarvaśūra satvā ihāgatvā te sarve anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyante;  sarve te tathāgatagocarapariniṣpattaye pariniṣpadyante.  [SaSū(C) 24] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha:
tgt_original: 時有一切勇菩提薩埵白佛言。

src_original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yad ete satvā ihagatvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyante?
tgt_original: 世尊。 何因緣故。 此會眾生得發菩提。

src_original: 2. bhagavān āha:
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: sādhu sādhu sarvaśūra yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase. iha sarvaśūra pariṇāmanāviśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ.
tgt_original: 一切勇。

src_original: [SaSū(C) 25] 1. bhūtapūrvaṃ sarvaśūrātīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpai ratnaśrīr nāma  tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loko udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid  anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān.
tgt_original: 乃往過去無數阿僧祇劫有佛世尊。 號曰寶德。

src_original: [SaSū(C) 26] tena khalu punaḥ sarvaśūra kālenāhaṃ māṇavako 'bhūvam. 2. ye satvāḥ
tgt_original: 我時作摩納之子。

src_original: sāṃprataṃ mayā buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhapitās te sarve tena kālena tena samayena mṛgā
tgt_original: 此會眾生住佛智慧者。 往昔之時悉在鹿中。

src_original: abhūvan. 3. tena ca kālena tena samayenāham evaṃ praṇidhānam akārṣaṃ:
tgt_original: 我時發願。

src_original: tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tilaṃ vāpayed;
tgt_original: 若三千大千世界滿中胡麻。

src_original: yāvantas te tilaphalakās tāvanto rājānaś cakravartino bhaveyur;
tgt_original: 以此數轉輪聖王。

src_original: atha kaścid eva puruṣo bhaved āḍhayo mahābhogaḥ;  3. atha khalu sa puruṣas teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ dānan dadyāt;
tgt_original: 若有人布施如是輪王。

src_original: yaś caikasya srotaāpannasya dānam dadyād,  ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati.
tgt_original: 不如布施一須陀洹。 若施三千世界諸須陀洹所得功德。 不如施一斯陀含。

src_original: [SaSū(C) 89] 1. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve srotaāpanā bhaveyus,
tgt_original: 若施三千世界諸斯陀含。

src_original: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yat puṇyaskandhaṃ,  ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya sakṛdāgāmino dānan dadyād. 2. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve sakṛdāgāmino  teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ,  ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasyānāgāmino dānān dadyād. 3. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'nāgāmino  teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ,
tgt_original: 不如施一阿那含。 若施三千世界諸阿那含。

src_original: ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasyārhato dānan dadyād. 4. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ,
tgt_original: 不如施一阿羅漢。 若施三千世界諸阿羅漢。

src_original: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ,  ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya pratyekabuddhasya dānan dadyād. 5. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve pratyekabuddhā bhaveyus,  teṣān sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati
tgt_original: 不如施一辟支佛。

src_original: ya ekasya bodhisatvasya dānan dadyād. 6. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās  te sarve bodhisatvā bhaveyus,
tgt_original: 若施三千世界諸辟支佛。 不如施一菩薩。 若施三千世界諸菩薩。

src_original: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ,  ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya tathāgatasya cittaṃ prasādayed.
tgt_original: 不如施一如來所起清淨心。 若於三千世界諸如來所生清淨心。
